title: Adjust Inventory for Warehouse Damage
description: A forklift operator accidentally damages a pallet of goods in the warehouse. The damaged items must be adjusted out of inventory.

tasks.description: The operator reports the damage incident, specifying the item, location, and quantity damaged.
tasks.expected_outcome: A damage report is created in the system.

tasks.description: A supervisor reviews the report and approves the inventory adjustment.
Process an inventory adjustment to remove the damaged quantity from stock, using 'Warehouse Damage' as the reason.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system inventory is updated to reflect the loss.
